translate.vn: Vietnam research and development Logistics of Institute (VLI) and Intelligent Financial Research & Consulting Viet Nam (IFRC Viet Nam) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) to pursue a strategic cooperation regarding the potential development of Logistics index products and research services in Viet Nam.
translate.us: Vietnam research and development Logistics of Institute (VLI) and Intelligent Financial Research & Consulting Viet Nam (IFRC Viet Nam) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) to pursue a strategic cooperation regarding the potential development of Logistics index products and research services in Viet Nam. The index meet six criteria: feasibility, representation, continuity, independence, transparency and usefulness.
VLI logistics indexes,vietnam logistics index,vietnam logistics industry
equities, bonds, commodities, derivatives,derivatives market,vietnam derivatives

The Women CEO Project is GLOBAL and the first step of a larger project on the relationship between corporate performance and governance. Other topics will be the presence of women on the board.
This will be achieved using two approaches: 1- The first is academic, through empirical researches, publications in financial journals verifying the existence of this relationship, seeking the influence of factors such as the development (frontiers, emerging or developed markets), culture, religion, education… of the countries in question. 2- The second is financial by creating a financial portfolio strategy as measured by an index into the final objective to propose investable products as funds or structured products. The index thus constructed will be somehow a continuous measurement of the performance if any. In the second step, if the data are available, we extend this research to private equities.
Outside the academic and financial interests of the Women CEO Project, this project also has significant social aspects:
1- Motivate and embolden women to contribute to society and the economy, inspire women managers/leaders and young businesswomen.
2- Promote the empowerment of women and public awareness of women’s roles, especially in economic leadership, offer further evidence for policy-makers to devise more women empower policies. This project started from Vietnam in 2013, will be extended this year to Asia and Europe, and finally cover most of countries in the world in 2015 (see Newsletter for calendar).

global, women, ceo, top, businesswomen, performance, gender, corporate governance, male, female, no glass ceiling, executives, asean, asia, europe, euro, vietnam, index, powerful, fortune, forbes, ranking, board, compensation, chair,

Vietnam, Geographical Economic, Index,PAPI , The Vietnam Provincial Governance and Public Administration Performance Index,PCI, (Provincial Competitiveness Index), effectiveness, Intelligent Financial Research & Consulting, IFRC.

The Vietnam Geographical Economic Indexes series
At the national level, Vietnam is trying to improve its competitiveness and international integration. Within the scope of local, regional leaders (province, city) were also eager to reform and develop policies and strategies for local economic development. The competition is silent, drastic and effective but has not been evaluated completely. PAPI (The Vietnam Provincial Governance and Public Administration Performance Index) and PCI (Provincial Competitiveness Index) biased towards measuring policy effectiveness. Therefore, Intelligent Financial Research & Consulting (IFRC) initiatives to create a Vietnam geographical economic index measuring the economic efficiency of provinces, cities and regions in Vietnam.
The Vietnam geographical economic indexes are designed and calculated based on the data of companies listed on stock exchanges, has its head office located in that geographic area. These indexes are calculated in proportion to market capitalisation, in the price and total return version; and conversion of different currencies (VND, USD, EUR, JPY).

IFRC, Intelligent Financial Research & Consulting, Research, Financial Analysis, Empirical Research

IFRC France and Vietnam want to contribute to the empirical research in Finance in Vietnam. Our company has already initiated several projects related to research: Global Women CEO, Vietnam Financial Database (VNFDB), Vietnam Virtual Derivatives Market (VNVDM). We c We calculate a family of portfolios daily and they will be available to researchers for free.
